name: Mirkowanie - Idle Money Clicker
description:
Addicting Idle Incremental Clicker, which is parody/funny game, don't play it, it can hurt your brain :-} Play it for your own risk. It's something like a Social Media simulator/tycoon/business, but that's not, it's something more, hard to say, its specific game, become popular, attention shall come. Find formula for fastest upgrade/profit. Research new ways for gains, build own attention empire. It is a game for boys, for girls. This app is Free to download

This free game is something specific, get into your viral/social life, gather attention, become popular, study various social things, find a lot of hidden easter eggs, jokes, you are just normal women/men from small city, and one day, you had found a specific website "Wykot", how it can change your life? Take various decisions (and chose best case), work for Janusz business, corporation.

Relax and play this game, and make fortune, become billionaire. Gameplay is casual and simple, tapping will grant You attention income, which you can invest into endless upgrader. earn You attention/money in real life time, each second grant a new cash income. Easy to play, just tap.  This is offline, not online game, best time waster.

This game is one big joke, please do not take it seriously. Game refers to a certain Poland portal, community. All similarities to real characters, places, events are accidental, the game does not represent the author thoughts, views.
